1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.13:
- Fixed trees not generating sometimes
- Fixed crystal leaves not generating with fruity leaves
+ Crystal Fruit now only grows when the Lost Aether is installed, unless config is set otherwise
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.12: - Fixed crash related to golden island worldgen
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.11: - Fixed crash with some forge versions
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.10:
+ Updated to latest Dynamic Trees version
+ Added update checker
+ Added sapling<->seed<->fruit recipes for Crystal tree when Aether Lost Content is installed
- Fixed golden oak trees on golden dungeon islands.
- Many other bug fixes
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.9:
+ Added species localizations
- Updated Golden Oak waila display to latest Dynamic Trees version.
- Minor fixes
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.8:
+ Fixed Zanite not harvesting amber from golden oak trees
+ Fixed WAILA / HWAILA not displaying logs and amber properly
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.6: - Fixed Dynamic Crystal Trees spawning even if Dynamic Trees worldgen is set to false.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.5:
+ Updated to work with Aether 1.5.0
+ Fixed grass having wrong color when tree is planted in the aether
+ Allowed overworld trees to be planted in aether grass
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.4: - Fixed golden logs dropping themselves. Now they behave like normal golden oak logs, dropping amber when chopped with a Gravitate or Valkyre axe.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.0:
Initial Release
+ Skyroot tree, Golden Oak Tree, Crystal Tree, Holiday Tree
+ Includes full world gen
